text: Me mangasava amima, Moses uan amerem Hobap, a kantri Midianɨn gumazim Ruelɨn otarim, kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “E datɨrɨghɨn danganir aghuir mamɨn mangam. Kar, danganir Ikiavɨra Itir God fomɨra e danɨngasa akar dɨkɨrɨzim gamizim. Ga uaning, nɨ e ko mangam. Eghtɨ e deraghvɨra nɨn ganam. Bar guizbangɨra, Ikiavɨra Itir God e ko akam akɨra ghaze, a bar deraghvɨra e damuam.”
